metadata.title: CVE-2024-0584 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: A use-after-free issue was found in igmp_start_timer in net/ipv4/igmp.c inthe network sub-component in the Linux Kernel. This flaw allows a localuser to observe a refcnt use-after-free issue when receiving an igmp querypacket, leading to a kernel information leak.
